results.content: Where is the integration between frontend and backend? That was the whole purpose of the tutorial. Instead you have 2 independent apps that do not communicate with each other

response.content: Thank you very much for your review. First of all, please ask questions for unclear points from Q&A tab. Yes this is important point and all frontend content is build on this integration... Backend provides API infrastructure. And frontend uses and consumes this API structure... And you can find the all steps on frontend side...  Please let me know if you have any unclear point. Or you can ask questions directly  from Q&A section.
